name: スーパーマリオスタジアム ミラクルベースボール
summary: Mario Superstar Baseball, known in Japan as Super Mario Stadium Miracle Baseball (スーパーマリオスタジアム ミラクルベースボール Sūpā Mario Sutajiamu Mirakuru Bēsubōru) is a sports game that was developed by Namco and Now Production and published by Nintendo for the GameCube in 2005. A sequel, Mario Super Sluggers, was released for the Wii in 2008.
